pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LlamaStop prompt tuning. Create your own Generative AI.## Installation```shpip install lamini```## Setup your keysGo to [https://app.lamini.ai/account](https://app.lamini.ai/account) and log in to get your API key and purchase credits.Create `~/.powerml/configure_llama.yaml` and put a key in it.```shproduction: key: "<YOUR-KEY-HERE>"```# DocumentationPackage Documentation here: [https://lamini-ai.github.io/](https://lamini-ai.github.io/)
